FuncDef: This command enhances VRF support in redirect policies. When a router instance is specified, the configured destination tests are run in the specified router instance, and the PBR action is executed in the specified router instance. If no destination is active or if the hardware does not support PBR action "next-hop router", action forward will be executed (i.e. routing will be performed in the context of the incoming interface routing instance).

ParaDef.Info: Specifies a router instance in the form of router-name or service-id. Values-router-name - Base.
Specifies the name of a configured Layer 3 service.
